get.summary: The program retrieves difference document and account adjustment (XIC) document details from the SR...
get.description: The program retrieves difference document and account adjustment (XIC) document details from the SROLTA file fields The document indicated by its reference number passed to the API, must be found in SROLTA and SROLTA.CTDTTP = '3' or '4' Otherwise an error message is sent in the response

get.summary: The program retrieves payment details from the SROLTA and SROLTAI file fields.
get.description: The program retrieves payment details from the SROLTA and SROLTAI file fields. The document indicated by its reference number passed to the API, must be found in SRODTA and SROLTAI, and SROLTA.CTDTTP = '1' Otherwise an error message is sent in the response

get.summary: The program retrieves payment details from the SROLTA and SROLTAP file fields.
get.description: The program retrieves payment details from the SROLTA and SROLTAP file fields. The document indicated by its reference number passed to the API, must be found in SROLTA and SROLTAP, and SROLTA.CTDTTP = '2' Otherwise an error message is sent in the response

get.summary: The program retrieves payment details from the SROLTA and SROLTAR file fields.
get.description: The program retrieves payment details from the SROLTA and SROLTAR file fields. The document indicated by its reference number passed to the API, must be found in SROLTA and SROLTAR, and SROLTA.CTDTTP = '5' Otherwise an error message is sent in the response

get.summary: The program retrieves details for BIL document of type 6 (DTDTTP = '6') from SRODTA and SRODTAB file...
get.description: The program retrieves details for BIL document of type 6 (DTDTTP = '6') from SRODTA and SRODTAB file fields. The document indicated by its reference number passed to the API, must be found in SRODTA and SRODTAB and SRODTA.DTDTTP = '6'. Otherwise an error message is sent in the response
